Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +10
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Blind-Fight: May reroll miss due to concealment/Invisible foe gains no melee bonus/Suffers half penalty for impaired vision
Combat Reflexes: May take AOO while flat-footed and 1 AOO/rd
Improved Grapple: Grapple provokes no AOO/+4 Grapple check
Improved Overrun: Gains +4 overrun Strength check/Foe cannot avoid overrun
Improved Shield Bash: Suffers no AC penalty when using Shield Bash
Improved Unarmed Strike: Unarmed attack provokes no AOO and may deal lethal damage
Improvised Weapon: Suffers no penalty w/improvised weapons and a -2 attack penalty for non-proficient weapons
Planar Fury: May gain +2 Strength, +2 Constitution, and +1 Will and suffer -1 AC for 6 rd 2/dy
Point-Blank Shot: +1 ranged attack and damage w/in 30'
Power Attack: May suffer up to -10 attack for equal damage bonus
Precise Shot: Suffers no penalty on shot into melee
Quick Draw: May draw a weapon as a free action

Magic
Spells:
Detect Outsider (Detect Outsider1 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on outsiders for 100 min
Summon Monster I (Sunderborn1 Grea): R50' 1 1st-level creature appears and fights foes for 10 rd
Summon Monster II (Sunderborn2 Grea): R50' 1 2nd- or 1d3 1st-level creatures appear and fight foes for 10 rd
Summon Monster III (Sunderborn3 Grea): R50' 1 3rd-, 1d3 2nd-, or 1d4+1 1st-level creatures appear and fight foes for 10 rd
Magic Notes:
Detect Outsider: May use Detect Outsider effects at will
Sunderborn: May use Summon Monster I, Summon Monster II, Summon Monster III 1/dy
